dct_title_s: Sketch map of Indiana, showing relative location of the sandstone area
dct_description_sm: Shows Mansfield sandstone areas and quarries. Plate VIII. Detached from: Area of Mansfield sandstone / mapped by T.C. Hopkins [and] E.M. Kindle. In Indiana Dept. of Geology and Natural Resources twentieth annual report. Indianapolis: Wm. B. Burford, 1896. Page 186.
Imprint: [Indianapolis] : [Indiana Department of Geology and Natural Resources], [1896]; Imprint: Indianapolis : Wm. B. Burford, [1896]
dct_creator_sm: Hopkins, Thomas Cramer, 1861-1935; Kindle, E. M. (Edward Martin), 1869-1940
dct_publisher_sm: Indiana. Department of Geology and Natural Resources
